response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect addition to your collection or business. Given its significance and rarity, I understand its worth to you might be substantial. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this product for $950,000.

This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a premium over its perceived worth. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be making a strategic investment that could yield significant returns or fulfill a long-standing desire.

Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer. If you need more information about the product or have any concerns, I am here to provide you with all the details you require.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
